page.title: 02TRADE
page.content: {FORGET ME NOT _Winsford Forget Me Not is a florists in Delamere Street. It has been open eighteen months. This shop sells fresh and artificial flowers, plants, glassware, pottery and wrapping paper. The fresh flowers are purchased daily in Manchester and come from countries as far away as Holland and Israel. The artificial flowers are made in Hongkong and Taiwan. Wedding bouquets and funeral sprays are made to order. All flowers can be delivered. The shop operates an Interflora service_this means that flowers can be sent anywhere in the world. Most of this shop's customers are local but because it is situated on a busy road there is a lot of passing trade. Christmas Day, St Valentine's Day and Mother's Day are when most flowers are sold.
